title: of the Electoral Act 1992 (No. 23 of 1992) (as adapted by the Housing, Planning
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electoral Act 1992 (Designated
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electoral Act 1992 (Designated 

Registration Authority) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited electoral act 1992 (designated registration authority) regulation 2023

title: of the Electoral Act 1992 (No. 23 of 1992) (as adapted by the Housing, Planning
heading: In these Regulations, the “Electoral Act 1992” means the Electoral Act
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, the “Electoral Act 1992” means the Electoral Act 

1992 as amended by the Electoral Reform Act 2022.
text_norm: 2 regulation electoral act 1992 mean electoral act 1992 amended electoral reform act 2022

title: of the Electoral Act 1992 (No. 23 of 1992) (as adapted by the Housing, Planning
heading: 3. Dublin City Council is prescribed as the Designated Registration
text_raw:
3. Dublin City Council is prescribed as the Designated Registration 

Authority for the purposes of section 13B(1) of the Electoral Act 1992. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 September, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [460] 3
text_norm: 3 dublin city council prescribed designated registration authority purpose section 13b(1) electoral act 1992 given official seal 20 september 2023 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 22nd september 2023 460 3

title: of the Electoral Act 1992 (No. 23 of 1992) (as adapted by the Housing, Planning
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations prescribe Dublin city Council as the Designated Registration 
Authority for the purpose of establishing, managing and maintaining a shared 
database to facilitate registration authorities in the efficient performance of their 
functions in relation to the electoral register and related data sharing 
arrangements. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [460]
